sentence.Network_en: They were partaking of our simple meal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们跟我们一起吃便饭.

sentence.Network_en: How many workers are partaking in the firm's insurance plan?
sentence.Network_cn: 有多少工人参加公司的保险计划?

sentence.Network_en: In fact, partaking in this meal can take a whole evening.
sentence.Network_cn: 所以你要好好花点时间认真嘴嚼品味他它的每一道菜了!

PerfectNetExp.abs: Are you partaking in the speech contest ?, 你打算参加演讲比赛吗?

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译a_专业词汇... ... partake in 参与 partake of 吃光 partake 分担.
2013年8月17日 - Sco谯认为,参与者(partaker)概念有助于纠正一个普遍的社会学偏见:过分强调现存社会结构的重要性,而贬低个人的想像力和创造力。同时,“参与者’’概念.
...石油、烟草、民航、有线电视等行业是行政垄断部门，没有消费选择权的所有消费者不得不成为痛苦的“垄奴”。拼客 partaker点评:“拼客”即共同参与某项活动的人，在英语中，动词“partake”有“参与”之意，因此，“拼客”.
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... overthrown 推翻；打倒 partake 分享；参与；分担； partook 分享.

entry.def: If you partake of food or drink, you eat or drink some of it.

example.ex: They were happy to partake of our feast, but not to share our company.
example.tran: 他们喜欢享用我们准备的丰盛大餐，但是不喜欢和我们呆在一起。

entry.def: If you partake in an activity, you take part in it.

example.ex: You will probably be asked about whether you partake in very vigorous sports.
example.tran: 你可能会被问到是否参加非常剧烈的体育运动。

entry.tran: 在某种程度上具有（某种特性）
entry.def: If something partakes of a particular quality, it has that quality to some extent.

example.ex: Miracles are not generally regarded as magical. Nevertheless, they do partake of the same nature.
example.tran: 奇迹一般不会被认为是魔法使然，不过二者在本质上有点相似。

auth_sentence.content: They witness glimpses of their own lives while partaking of the extraordinary.
auth_sentence.res_content: They witness glimpses of their own lives while partaking of the extraordinary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They witness glimpses of their own lives while partaking of the extraordinary.

auth_sentence.content: Today, Sikhs celebrate by watching and partaking in martial arts parades, led by the nishan sahibs of the Gurdwaras.
